title: Support Our Work
subtitle: Help us improve water quality analysis for sustainable agriculture

whySupport.title: Why Support?
whySupport.p1: WaterQ AI is developed as an open educational and research tool to help farmers, researchers, and water management professionals make informed decisions about irrigation water quality.
items: Add new water quality indicators and assessment tools
Conduct research to enhance water quality analysis methods
Provide educational resources for sustainable water management
Make the tool available in more languages for global accessibility

card.title: Donate via Credit Card
card.desc: Support our work with a secure credit card payment

orgSupport.title: For Organizations
orgSupport.p1: If you represent an organization, scientific or educational establishment interested in supporting sustainable water management technologies, the developer offers partnership opportunities:
items: Sponsored research in water quality assessment
Customized versions of WaterQ AI for specific needs
Training workshops for your staff or beneficiaries
Joint development of enhanced features or methodologies

otherWays.title: Other Ways to Contribute
otherWays.p: Financial support is not the only way to contribute. You can also help by:

items.label: Share Your Expertise
items.desc: If you're a water quality expert, agronomist, or software developer, consider contributing to the methodology or code.

items.label: Spread the Word
items.desc: Share WaterQ AI with colleagues, extension services, or farming communities who might benefit from it.

items.label: Provide Feedback
items.desc: Help me improve by reporting bugs, suggesting features, or sharing how you use the tool in your work.

items.label: Translate Content
items.desc: Volunteer to translate the application interface or documentation into other languages are welcome.
